name: Grilled Steak
description: A perfectly grilled steak with a smoky flavor and tender texture.

name: Beef Stew
description: A hearty and comforting stew with tender beef chunks, vegetables, and rich broth.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty with all your favorite toppings, sandwiched in a soft bun.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Tortillas filled with seasoned beef, fresh veggies, and flavorful salsa.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Quick and delicious stir-fried beef with a variety of colorful vegetables.

name: Beef Chili
description: Spicy and hearty chili made with ground beef, beans, and a mix of spices.

name: Beef Kebabs
description: Skewered and grilled beef pieces marinated in a flavorful sauce.

name: Beef Pot Roast
description: Slow-cooked beef roast with vegetables and savory broth, falling apart and tender.
